content: A new proposal has been announced: Add m68k-unknown-linux-gnu as new Tier 3 backend #458. It will be announced at the next meeting to try and draw attention to it, but usually MCPs are not discussed during triage meetings. If you think this would benefit from discussion amongst the team, consider proposing a design meeting.

Nit, some of the answers are ambiguous. It isn't clear to me (without considering contextual knowledge) if

The target must not introduce license incompatibilities.

This is not the case for the m68k-unknown-linux-gnu target.

means the target does not introduce incompatibilities or if it means that it does introduce license incompatibilities.
@T-compiler: Proposal #458 has been seconded, and will be approved in 10 days if no objections are raised.
